name: Voxel Miner: Dwellers of The Deep
name_original: Voxel Miner: Dwellers of The Deep
description:
Deep in the caves, surrounded by unknown monsters... Voxel Miner: Dwellers of the Deep, is a single player game where you mine resources to upgrade different skills, abilities, and fight the creatures you come across along the way! Strategize your upgrades, fight monsters, or just sit back and enjoy the satisfying mechanics. The choice is yours...

Features

  • Procedural map generation, no two worlds are the same!
  • Endless gameplay.
  • Variety of unique upgrades.
  • Satisfying gameplay mechanics.
  • Stylized art style.
  • Beautiful soundtrack.
  • Customizable settings.
  • Detailed stats.
  • Leaderboards.
  • Achievements.
  • Custom world generation.
  • Custom texture manager.
